body_html: Note that batch normalization is a different operation depending on whether the layer is convolutional or not: when using it on a convolutional layer, you can aggregate sufficient statistics across patches. Not so when the layer is fully connected. Reshaping to [-1, 1, 1, depth] is the correct thing to do though, and we should probably just do that.
